# Changelog

All notable changes to `filament-rating` will be documented in this file.

## v1.0.0 - 2024-03-17

- Add half star theme
- Add color customization
- Add size customization

## v0.2.1 - 2024-03-17

Fix disabled state always being true.

## v0.1.0 - 2024-03-17

Initial release.

Things are working:

- Form component
- Table column
- Infolist entry
- Themes
- Number of stars
- Allowing zero stars

## 1.0.0 - 202X-XX-XX

- initial release
